description: Try our easy to follow Scallops With Citrus Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Scallops With Citrus Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 raw peeled shrimp, with tails left on
24 shelled and cleaned scallops, corals removed
1 mango, peeled, pitted, and cut into chunks
1 lime, finely grated zest and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Make the citrus dressing by mixing together all the ingredients in a small bowl.
Poach the shrimp in a saucepan of simmering water for 2 minutes, then drain.
Put the scallops, mango, and shrimp in a bowl and pour 3 tablespoons of the dressing over them. Mix well to coat before threading them alternately onto 8 skewers.
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat, add the skewers, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, turning and basting occasionally, until golden brown and cooked through.
Arrange the skewers on serving plates with the salad greens and serve with the remaining dressing.
